last_episode_to_air.name: Eulogy
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Foxes reunite to determine the family’s future when an unexpected crisis threatens to end their journey once and for all.

name: The Mosquito Coast
overview: Allie Fox—a brilliant inventor and stubborn idealist—uproots his family for a dangerous quest through Mexico to flee the U.S. government and find safety.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, after barely escaping Mexico with their lives, the Foxes venture deep into the Guatemalan jungle to meet up with an old friend and her community of refugees. This new refuge creates trouble for the Foxes though when they become entangled in a conflict between a local drug lord and his family. At odds about whether to settle down or keep moving, Allie and Margot pursue different paths to secure their family’s future. The outcome of which will either unite the family or tear it apart forever.

tagline: Every answer comes at a cost.

episodes.name: Light Out
episodes.overview: When the U.S. government finally tracks them down, the off-the-grid Fox family flees to begin a new life.

episodes.name: foxes and coyotes
episodes.overview: The Foxes enlist the help of two coyotes who promise to take them across the U.S. border into Mexico.

episodes.name: Everybody Knows This Is Nowhere
episodes.overview: With the Feds closing in on them, the Foxes and Chuy must cross the desert on foot—and face adversity both natural and man-made.

episodes.name: Bus Stop
episodes.overview: The Foxes seek refuge in an opulent hacienda, where a family’s all-powerful matriarch sees them as pawns in her own game.

episodes.name: Elvis, Jesus, Coca-Cola
episodes.overview: Arriving in Mexico City, the Fox parents attempt to connect with Allie’s mysterious contact while the kids get into trouble.

episodes.name: Calaca
episodes.overview: Held captive by a shadowy organization, Allie and Margot must find a way to escape and get back to their kids.

episodes.name: The Glass Sandwich
episodes.overview: The Foxes are forced into a crisis that will either bring them back together or tear them apart forever. Season finale.

episodes.name: The Damage Done
episodes.overview: While venturing deep into the jungle, Allie and Margot reveal the truth about how they became fugitives from the U.S. government.

episodes.name: Least Concern Species
episodes.overview: After a storm capsizes their boat, the Foxes work to repair it so they won't be stranded by rising waters in an unforgiving jungle.

episodes.name: Talk About the Weather
episodes.overview: The Foxes find refuge in an isolated jungle haven, but difficulties integrating with the community leave the family torn about whether to stay.

episodes.name: A Rag, a Bone, a Hank of Hair
episodes.overview: Margot pursues a course of action that threatens to tear the family apart. Charlie has a dangerous encounter that jeopardizes everyone’s safety.

episodes.name: Positive, Front-Facing Optics
episodes.overview: Allie is forced to complete a dangerous task for Casa Roja’s landlord. An unexpected guest throws Margot and the kids’ lives into disarray.

episodes.name: Goat Head Taco
episodes.overview: New revelations about Casa Roja leave Allie trapped working with a local drug lord, forcing Margot to take the family’s future into her hands.

episodes.name: The Burning of Judas
episodes.overview: Allie makes a discovery that could change his family’s fortunes forever. Margot gets close to Richard in hopes of earning his trust.

episodes.name: Dead Totems
episodes.overview: Charlie and Allie trek through the jungle to uncover Guillermo’s secret. Margot learns Richard’s true intentions at Casa Roja.

episodes.name: The Counterfeiters
episodes.overview: Allie and Margot forge different paths to secure their family’s future. Dina lays low at a luxury resort and considers a path of her own.

episodes.name: Eulogy
episodes.overview: The Foxes reunite to determine the family’s future when an unexpected crisis threatens to end their journey once and for all.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two, after barely escaping Mexico with their lives, the Foxes venture deep into the Guatemalan jungle to meet up with an old friend and her community of refugees. This new refuge creates trouble for the Foxes though when they become entangled in a conflict between a local drug lord and his family. At odds about whether to settle down or keep moving, Allie and Margot pursue different paths to secure their family’s future. The outcome of which will either unite the family or tear it apart forever.
